title: Why did I queue penality?
body: I'm so sick of waiting these 5 minutes before every game. Yeah I have some lag issues but that's why I play the bot games instead of vs players. My internet and housing situation haven't been good since my dad passed it feels really bad I'm getting punished for no reason. Yeah I have slight dc's but I always reconnect and make a good contribution to the team. Look up my match history if you don't believe me. Yet I still get punished! Then after I hit accept if someone leaves and I miss the second accept I have to wait A WHOLE 5 MINUTES AGAIN. Is this a bug? The whole system feels so bad.

replies.body:
Yeeaaa that can feel *incredibly* frustrating when you wait out an LPQ only for something to go wrong and have to sit through it again. It looks like you were able to get those games played out already before I got here, but I do wanna go ahead and have you try a couple things to see if I can get you a little more stable connection for the future.

Do me a favor and update a couple [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), specifically port forwarding and DNS server settings. Those two can tell your connection to take a smoother route to our servers for what should be a stronger link. Feel free to let me know if it doesn't seem to help at all and I might have a couple other things we can try.
